description: Adrian Newey designed it. The same man who designed F1 cars that won championships. The Cosworth 6.5L V12 revs to 11,100 RPM and the hybrid system adds electric torque fill. Ground effect aerodynamics generate more downforce than the car weighs. This is an F1 car with license plates.
lore: Adrian Newey designed it. The same man who designed F1 cars that won championships. This is an F1 car with license plates.
